issue.title: [C++][Compute] Hash Join performance improvement
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14182](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14182). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add micro-benchmarks for hash join exec node.
Write a new implementation of the interface HashJoinImpl making sure that it is efficient for all types of join. Current implementation, based on unordered map, trades performance for a simpler code and is likely not as fast as it could be.
